Name: battery cell production, Li-ion, NCA | battery cell, Li-ion, NCA | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
Description: This dataset includes a method of producing Li-ion cell. Lithium ions move from the cathode (NCA) into the electrolyte through the micropores of the separator into the silicon coated graphite anode during the charging phase. During the discharge of the battery, the Li+-ions move back into the cathode.
